text: Christian Sáinz Valdés Castro (born 8 December 1974), known professionally as Cristian Castro or Cristian, is a Mexican pop singer. He is the son of actors Veronica Castro and Manuel "El Loco" Valdés. He is known for his slight tenor vocal singing. Castro is known as one of the most well known Hispanic pop singers of the last three decades. Juan Gabriel described Castro as "the man with the most faculties to sing in Mexico". ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican pop singers Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: Cristian Castro
